column4: Can anyone explain why a bios screen might be running slow?  I've never encountered this before.  Everytime you I hit a key, there's a 1 or 2 second delay.  And this is in the BIOS!! Help?
I don't knwo who else to ask
##hardware would be a better place to ask, as this isn't Ubuntu related.
thanks... tried #hardware but it was invite only... will try ##hardware
